walking.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the activity or sport of going for walks, especially in the countryside or mountains
walking.translation[0].definitions[0].no: walking holiday/tour etc (=a holiday on which you walk a lot, especially in the countryside)
walking.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We went walking in the hills.
walking.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the sport of walking long distances as fast as you can without actually running
